'''Sofia Dankis''' is a freelance writer<ref>{{mcnet|new-year--new-builds--new-writer-|New Year, New Builds, New Writer!|January 24, 2020|Sofia Dankis}}</ref> who writes articles for [[Minecraft.net]]. She is Swedish. Although she is no longer an employee at [[Mojang Studios]], she is still contracted by them to write articles at Minecraft.net.<ref name=:0>{{cite|url=https://www.linkedin.com/in/sofiadankis/|title=Sofia Dankis|website=LinkedIn}}</ref><ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/credits</ref><ref>https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/article/the-copper-cape-quest-continues</ref>
